response.body:
Page not found (404)

Request Method: POST
Request URL: http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/token/

Using the URLconf defined in Hackerz.urls, Django tried these URL patterns, in this order:

  1. admin/
  2. blog/
  3. shop/
  4. api/v1/ ^users/$ [name='user-list']
  5. api/v1/ ^users\.(?P<format>[a-z0-9]+)/?$ [name='user-list']
  6. api/v1/ ^users/(?P<pk>[^/.]+)/$ [name='user-detail']

  20. api/v1/ ^shop/reviews/(?P<pk>[^/.]+)/$ [name='review-detail']
  21. api/v1/ ^shop/reviews/(?P<pk>[^/.]+)\.(?P<format>[a-z0-9]+)/?$ [name='review-detail']
  22. api/v1/ ^shop/orders/$ [name='order-list']
  23. api/v1/ ^shop/orders\.(?P<format>[a-z0-9]+)/?$ [name='order-list']

  28. api/v1/ ^blog/tags/(?P<slug>[^/.]+)/$ [name='tag-detail']
  29. api/v1/ ^blog/tags/(?P<slug>[^/.]+)\.(?P<format>[a-z0-9]+)/?$ [name='tag-detail']
  30. api/v1/ ^blog/categories/$ [name='blog-category-list']
  31. api/v1/ ^blog/categories\.(?P<format>[a-z0-9]+)/?$ [name='blog-category-list']
  32. api/v1/ ^blog/categories/(?P<slug>[^/.]+)/$ [name='blog-category-detail']
  33. api/v1/ ^blog/categories/(?P<slug>[^/.]+)\.(?P<format>[a-z0-9]+)/?$ [name='blog-category-detail']
  34. api/v1/ ^blog/posts/$ [name='post-list']

  36. api/v1/ ^blog/posts/(?P<slug>[^/.]+)/$ [name='post-detail']
  37. api/v1/ ^blog/posts/(?P<slug>[^/.]+)\.(?P<format>[a-z0-9]+)/?$ [name='post-detail']
  38. api/v1/ ^blog/posts/(?P<slug>[^/.]+)/comments/$ [name='post-comments']
  39. api/v1/ ^blog/posts/(?P<slug>[^/.]+)/comments\.(?P<format>[a-z0-9]+)/?$ [name='post-comments']
  40. api/v1/ ^blog/comments/$ [name='comment-list']

  59. terms/ [name='terms']

  61. favicon.ico
  62. update-account/ [name='update_account']
  63. become-vendor/ [name='become_vendor']
  64. wishlist/add/ [name='add_to_wishlist']

  66. wishlist/ [name='wishlist']
  67. confirm-email/<uuid:token>/ [name='confirm_email']
  68. registration-success/ [name='registration_success']
  69. resend-confirmation/ [name='resend_confirmation']
  70. password-reset/ [name='password_reset']
  71. password-reset/done/ [name='password_reset_done']
  72. password-reset-confirm/<uidb64>/<token>/ [name='password_reset_confirm']
  73. password-reset-complete/ [name='password_reset_complete']
  74. admin/group/<str:group_name>/ [name='group_users']
  75. ^static/(?P<path>.*)$
  76. ^media/(?P<path>.*)$

The current path, api/v1/token/, didn’t match any of these.

You’re seeing this error because you have DEBUG = True in your Django settings file. Change that to False, and Django will display a standard 404 page.

The current path, api/v1/projects/, didn’t match any of these.

You’re seeing this error because you have DEBUG = True in your Django settings file. Change that to False, and Django will display a standard 404 page.
